summary:
The Security Council, 
Guided by the UN Charter, 
Recalling relevant resolutions on the Middle East, including the Palestinian question, 
Demanding all parties comply with international law, 

 
1. Demands an immediate ceasefire for Ramadan, a lasting sustainable ceasefire, 
immediate and unconditional release of hostages, humanitarian access, and 
compliance with international law for detainees; 

2. Urges expanding humanitarian assistance and protection to civilians in Gaza, 
lifting barriers to aid, in line with international humanitarian law and 
resolutions 2712 (2023) and 2720 (2023); 

3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter
